Code: EXEC SQL SELECT T2.NRCERTIF FROM SEGUROS.V0PRODUTOSVG T1, SEGUROS.V0PRODUTOSVG T2 WHERE T1.NUM_APOLICE = :NUM_APOLICE AND T1.ORIG_PRODU = 'ESPEC' AND T1.CODPRODU NOT BETWEEN 7700 AND 7799 AND T2.NUM_APOLICE = T1.NUM_APOLICE AND T2.CODSUBES = T1.CODSUBES AND T2.DTPROXVEN <> '9999-12-31' END SQL
